snippet: For some older Americans, bankruptcy can provide much-needed relief from debt while protecting retirement assets.
abstract: Filing for Chapter 7 bankruptcy can be a valuable tool in relieving crippling debt while protecting retirement assets; evidence shows many retirees feel such shame when financial chaos hits that they wait too long to get the help they need to protect themselves for the future.
lead_paragraph: For some older Americans, bankruptcy can provide much-needed relief from debt while protecting retirement assets.

headline.main: Bankruptcy Can Help Seniors Protect Assets
headline.print_headline: Bankruptcy Can Help Seniors Protect Assets
